alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 5:59PM CST until December 29 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 2 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 2 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
